name: Power Sink
storyline:
In the depths of a decaying underwater power plant, you must guide the Diver down in order to restore power to their home and uncover the secrets held by the creaky grid that supports it.

Welcome to the world of Power Sink, our friend the Diver is one of many occupants in a gorgeous underwater colony, full of familiar life and buzzing with energy. Well... at least it was. Something's gone wrong and it's your job to venture into the depths of your home to restore the connections between your community and the well forgotten about power station that lies below.

You must traverse the aging structures beneath you, reconnect a series of Station Platforms and piece together the cause of the explosive depowering of the world around.

Explore and repair the station before your home falls into ruin.
summary: Power Sink is a Puzzle-Platformer, set in the depths of an underwater hydrothermal power plant. Explore and repair the station before it falls to pieces from the pressure of the sea and the heat from below.
